tasks.label: CMake: Deploy Plugin (Debug)
tasks.command: export XPLANE_PLUGIN_DIR='/Volumes/storage/X-Plane 12/Resources/plugins/x-ai';bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; test -n "${XPLANE_PLUGIN_DIR:-}"; cmake -E remove_directory "${XPLANE_PLUGIN_DIR}"; cmake -E make_directory "${XPLANE_PLUGIN_DIR}"; cmake -E copy_directory "${PWD}/build/debug/xplane_plugin" "${XPLANE_PLUGIN_DIR}"'
